Package ui.input.selection.layout

Class SelectableCentredSection<T extends SelectableSection>

  • java.lang.Object
    • ui.drawing.DrawableSection
      • ui.drawing.layout.DrawableResponsiveSection
        • ui.drawing.layout.CentredSection<T>
          • ui.input.selection.layout.SelectableCentredSection<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The type of selectable section to centre.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    ColouredElement, ResponsiveSection, PrintHandler, Section, ResizeHandler, SelectableResponsiveSection, SelectableSection, SelectionHandler
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    MenuButton
    public class SelectableCentredSection<T extends SelectableSection>
extends CentredSection<T>
implements SelectableResponsiveSection
    A selectable centred section.
    Centres a section by filling the characters around it with the filler char.
    A responsive section with a stored number of rows and columns.
    Represents a section that can be drawn to the terminal window.
